press.title: Science is Everyone: Bringing Sports to All with AI and XR Tech
press.author: By Coalition Blog
press.content: Dr. Tica Lin recently earned her PhD in computer science at Harvard University. Her work with the Harvard Visual Computing Group focuses on Immersive Analytics, SportsXR, and Human-AI Interaction, particularly in developing XR visualization and interaction for real-life dynamic environments.
press.blockquote: ...To augment audiences' game-viewing experiences with rich data, our lab designed embedded visualizations in videos to bring data closer to basketball fans for game analysis.

press.content: "How much cooler would basketball footage be if software could automatically shine a spotlight on key players? How much easier would it be to understand plays if arrows could indicate movement before the players actually move?"
